flavor.reason: Some diners enjoyed the specialty rolls, but others found the sushi bland or overly sauced.

freshness.reason: Freshness varied, with some praising the fish quality while others noted issues with cold or stale items.

service.reason: Service was inconsistent, with reports of inattentive staff and long wait times.

environment.reason: The ambiance was modern and trendy, though some found the indoor space cramped.

value.reason: Many felt the restaurant was overpriced for the quality of food and service provided.
